title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2024”
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official 
Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2024. 

(2) The citation “the European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food 
Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2024” 
includes these Regulations. 

(3) These Regulations come into operation on 2 July 2024.

title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2024”
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 575 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2024” means the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 51 of 2024).

heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2024)
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2024) 

of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) by substituting for the definition of “Annex I to EU Regulation 

2019/1793” the following: 

“‘Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex I to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(2) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1662 of 11 June 20241;”, 

(b) by substituting for the definition of “Annex II to EU Regulation 

2019/1793” the following: 

1 OJ L, 2024/1662, 12.6.2024.

"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024.

“‘Annex II to EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Annex II to EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 as inserted by Article 1(2) of Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1662 of 11 June 20241;”, 
and 

(c) by substituting for the definition of “EU Regulation 2019/1793” 

the following: 

“‘EU Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 20192 as amended by 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 
20203, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 
14 April 20214, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/1900 of 27 October 20215, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 May 20226, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 20237, 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 
20238, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/286 of 
16 January 20249 and Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2024/1662 of 11 June 20241;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 June, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 

Minister for Health.

title: Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2024”
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give further effect to Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2024/1662 of 11 June 2024 amending Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2019/1793 on the temporary increase of official controls and emergency 
measures governing the entry into the Union of certain goods from certain third 
countries implementing Regulations (EU) 2017/625 and (EC) No. 178/2002 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020) in the manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2024 and come into operation on 2 July 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [310] 5
